result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Clerk Marisa.
Case Called: 8:47 am 
INCLUDES 14CF526, 14CF902, 14CF903, AND 15CM739. 
State appears by ADA Kyle Mayo; Def appears in person with Atty Pauline Toulouse.  

INITIAL APPEARANCE IN 15CM739. 
Reading Waived. Address is correct. 
Plea: Not Guilty. 
COURT ORDERS: $1,000 signature bond - CONDITIONS: No contact with A.M. and Downtown Pawn Shop. 
COURT sets calendar call on 5/6/2015 at 1pm with Br. 3 JA. 

PLEA HEARING IN 14CF526, 14CF902, AND 14CF903. 
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed. VRCW. 
State moves to: 
In 14CF526: Ct. 1 (Possession of Narcotic Drugs/2nd and Subsequent Offense/Repeater)>>DELETE 2nd and Subsequent Offense enhancer. 
                    : Ct. 2 (Possess Illegally Obtained Prescription/Repeater)>>D&RI. 
                    : Ct. 4 (Retail Theft/Repeater)>>D&RI. 
                    : Ct. 5 (Misd. BJ/Repeater)>>D&RI. 
In 14CF902: Ct. 1 (Felony BJ/Repeater)>>D&RI. 
In 14CF903: Ct. 1 (Felony BJ/Repeater)>>D&RI. 
                   : Ct. 3 (Misd. BJ/Repeater)>>D&RI. 
COURT grants above. 
PLEA: 
In 14CF526: Amended Ct. 1 (Possession of Narcotic Drugs/Repeater)>>NO CONTEST. 
                    : Ct. 3 (Retail Theft/Repeater)>>NO CONTEST. 
In 14CF903: Ct. 2 (Theft/Repeater)>>NO CONTEST. 
COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis, & def guilty. 
Atty Toulouse makes statement. Def makes statement. 
COURT ORDERS: SWH for 30 months probation - CONDITIONS: Assessment/treatment/counseling or follow through with any current recommendations as required by outpateint treatment at Koininia or as deemed appropriate by the dept; maintain fulltime employment/schooling/combination of the 2 of at least 30 hours per week or if not, perform 10 hours community service per week; absolute sobriety from drugs and alcohol except for prescriptions taken as prescribed and with prior agent authorization; DNA sample; payment of court costs. 
COURT ORDERS as CONDITION of Probation in 14CF903 ONLY: 6 months MCJ imposed and STAYED for rule violations
COURT finds the def is entitled to NO days jail credit if revoked in both files - parties may submit stipulation re: jail credit at a later date as needed. 
COURT authorizes transfer of probation to Vilas County. 
Adj: 9:08 am
Plea/sentencing hearing on April 30, 2015 at 08:45 am.
Status conference on March 11, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
org. warrant returned from Sheriff's dept.

Clerk Marisa.
Case Called: 8:43 am 
INCLUDES 14CF526, 14CF902, AND 14CF903. 
State appears by ADA Kerri Puig; Deft appears in person, in custody with Atty Pauline Toulouse. 

BOND FORFEITURE HEARING ON ALL FILES. 
Atty Toulouse notes deft was in custody in another county on date of missed arraignment. 
COURT vacates bond forfeiture and reinstates previous bond. 

ARRAIGNMENT ON ALL FILES. 
Read waived. 
Plea: Not Guilty. 
Calendar Call set for 2/4/2015 at 1pm to set future dates. 

Adj: 8:45 am
BOTR: 10:02 am 
No appearances. COURT notes bench warrant needs to be quashed. 
***BENCH WARRANT QUASHED***
Adj; 10:03 am

dft

INCLUDES 14CF526, 14CF902, & 14CF903

Clerk Marisa.
Case Called: 1:38 pm 
INCLUDES 14CF526, 14CF902, AND 14CF903. 
State appears by ADA Kerri Puig; Deft does NOT appear - Atty Pauline Toulouse appears on his behalf.  
Date and time was set for Arraignment. 
State requests bench warrant and bond forfeiture. 
Atty Toulouse makes statement. 
COURT authorizes $5000 bench warrant on all files and orders bond forfeited. 
BFH set for 2/2/2015 at 8:30 am in Br. 3. 
Adj: 1:40 pm

Clerk Marisa.
Case Called: 8:57 am 
INCLUDES 14CF526, 14CF902, AND 14CF903. 
State appears by ADA Kyle Mayo; Deft does NOT appear - Atty Pauline Toulouse appears on his behalf. 
Date and time was set for preliminary hearing in 14CF902 and 14CF903. 
State requests bench warrant. 
COURT questions Atty Toulouse regarding her client's status. Atty Toulouse makes statement. 
COURT makes findings. 
COURT authorizes $5000 bench warrant and orders bond forfeited. 
9:00 am - Def now appears. 
COURT vacates bench warrant and bond forfeiture. 

WAIVER OF PRELIMINARY HEARING IN 14CF902 AND 14CF903. 
Waiver of Prelim. filed. 
Court questions deft as to waiver. 
Court finds waiver freely and voluntarily made. 
COURT finds PC - Defendant bound over for arraignment & trial. 
Information to be filed. 
Bond: Continued.

of Preliminary Examination
